pages.text: The Atum is an endless desert dimension with so much to explore. You'll find many biomes, dungeons, ruins, many new mobs, new animals, 35+ unique artifacts for you to collect and a powerful pharaoh boss with 13 variants.$(br2)$(italic)How do you get to the Atum?$() You may be wondering. You must place sandstone 5 x 5 x 2, but the outer corners must be 4 blocks tall. Fill the inner

bottom layer with sandstone, then pour water in the inner top layer. Once the portal is built, all you need to do is throw a scarab into the water. You'll then be transported into the vast wasteland.$(br2)PLEASE NOTE: I HAVE YET TO BALANCE THIS MOD. THINGS MAY BE DIFFICULT OR EASY. THINGS ALSO MIGHT BREAK. BARE WITH ME.
